section.title: Remember User Account
section.para: Users who return to &PRODUCT; can be automatically authenticated thanks to a cookie set the first time they've logged in. Users do not have to perform an explicit authentication each time they access the portal.

step.para: Input your registered user name and password.
Select the Remember My Login check box when logging in &PRODUCT; at the first time.
Click the Sign in button to sign in the portal.

section.para: You must remember to close your browser without signing out (as signing out will delete the cookie).
